steps.goal: Find the best blog post explaining BERT. Determine appropriate search queries to identify relevant blog posts and return the top candidate.
Fetch the content of the blog post identified in step 1.
Summarize the fetched content of the blog post.
Post the summary and link of the blog post to the 'agentic' Slack channel. Format the message appropriately, including the blog post's title, a brief summary, and the link to the blog post.
